body:
Before:
```console
$ spack spec -I +v
Input spec
--------------------------------
==> Error: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'endswith'
```
After:
```console
$ spack spec -I +v
Input spec
--------------------------------
==> Error: Attempting to retrieve anonymous package.
```
@alalazo who would be the relevant reviewer here?
title: fix UnknownPackageError
